questions.text: Which of the following adverse effect of a drug is explored in the treatment of another disease?
Drug efficacy is defined as

options.label: A
options.text: Produce Maximum effect by acting on target

options.label: B
options.text: Therapeutic maximum response with dose change

options.label: C
options.text: Minimum amount of drug needed to produce a certain response

options.label: D
options.text: Amount of drug which reaches in circulationunchanged

questions.correct_answer: A. Produce Maximum effect by acting on target

questions.text: Effect on Vmax and Km in non-competietive inhibition is
questions.correct_answer: B. Vmax decreases, Km remains same

questions.text: Type B adverse drug reaction is

options.label: C
options.text: Effect seen on chronic use of the drug

questions.correct_answer: B. Allergic effect of the drug

questions.text: All the following drugs act on ionic channels except

questions.correct_answer: A. A and B are full agonists

questions.text: True statement about first order kinetics is

options.label: A
options.text: A constant amount of a drug is eliminated in unit time

options.label: B
options.text: The half-life increases with an increase in dose

options.label: C
options.text: The rate of elimination is constant

options.label: D
options.text: The rate of elimination is proportional to the plasma concentration

questions.correct_answer: D. The rate of elimination is proportional to the plasma concentration
